frameset.edef: to lessen, to decrease, to belittle

example.parse: (TOP (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS علق) (NP-SBJ-1 (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM مراسل) (NP (PUNC ") (NOUN_PROP هآرتس) (PUNC "))) (NP (NOUN_PROP زئيف) (NOUN_PROP شيف))) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الوثيقة))) (S-ADV (VP (ADJ.VN مقللاً) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (PP-CLR (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN اهميت) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها))))))) (PUNC .)))
